so_7675379: How to control mouse movement in linux?
ul_9973: Configuring mouse for right+left button simulating middle click (for copy/paste)
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_9973: Section "InputDevice"
        Identifier      "Configured Mouse"
        Driver          "mouse"
        Option          "CorePointer"
        Option          "Device"                "/dev/input/mice"
        Option          "Protocol"              "ImPS/2"
        Option          "Emulate3Buttons"       "true"
EndSection
